Question & Options:
Which statements accurately describe the relationships among the characters in Egyptian mythology?
Options:
A. A) Hathor is the lover of Horus.
B. B) Horus is the son of Isis and Osiris.
C. C) Isis is the lover of Osiris.
D. D) Osiris is the king of Egypt.
Correct Answer: A) Hathor is the lover of Horus., B) Horus is the son of Isis and Osiris., D) Osiris is the king of Egypt.

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements accurately describe relationships among the Egyptian deities?
Options:
A. A) Hathor is the lover of Horus.
B. B) Horus is the son of Isis.
C. C) Nephthys is a sister of Isis.
D. D) Horus is the brother of Nephthys.
Correct Answer: A) Hathor is the lover of Horus., B) Horus is the son of Isis., C) Nephthys is a sister of Isis.

Question & Options:
Which characters are directly related to Bek in *Gods of Egypt*?
Options:
A. Zaya
B. Horus
C. Isis
D. Osiris

What are the relationships among the characters in *Gods of Egypt*?
Options:
A. A) Zaya is in a romantic relationship with Bek
B. B) Bek is a thief who teams up with Horus
C. C) Horus is the son of Osiris
D. D) Osiris is the lover of Zaya
Correct Answer: A) Zaya is in a romantic relationship with Bek, B) Bek is a thief who teams up with Horus, C) Horus is the son of Osiris

Question & Options:
What are the familial relationships among Thoth, Horus, Isis, and Osiris in Egyptian mythology?
Options:
A. A) Thoth is the brother of Horus
B. B) Horus is the son of Isis and Osiris
C. C) Isis is the wife of Osiris
D. D) Thoth is the son of Isis
Correct Answer: A) Thoth is the brother of Horus, B) Horus is the son of Isis and Osiris, C) Isis is the wife of Osiris

Question & Options:
Which statements accurately describe the relationships among the characters in Egyptian mythology?

A. A) Thoth is the brother of Horus.
B. B) Horus is the son of Isis.

Correct Answer: A) Thoth is the brother of Horus., B) Horus is the son of Isis., C) Isis and Nephthys are sisters.

Question & Options:

B. B) Horus is the child of Isis and Osiris.
C. C) Isis is married to Osiris.

Correct Answer: A) Bek is a friend of Horus., B) Horus is the child of Isis and Osiris., C) Isis is married to Osiris.

Question & Options:

Options:
A. A) Bek is an ally of Horus.
B. B) Horus is the son of Isis.
C. C) Isis and Nephthys are sisters.
D. D) Nephthys is the wife of Set.
Correct Answer: A) Bek is an ally of Horus., C) Isis and Nephthys are sisters., D) Nephthys is the wife of Set.
